subject: Basketball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: With its All-Star Game to be played in New York, the N.B.A. is issuing a map and an app chronicling the long lineage and affiliations of local players, from Dolph Schayes to Kemba Walker.
snippet: With its All-Star Game to be played in New York, the N.B.A. is issuing a map and an app chronicling the long lineage and affiliations of local players, from Dolph Schayes to Kemba Walker.
